jirka_sherpa wrote:
> Hi, 
> I'm trying to embedding Heritrix into my app and it works somehow but
> i'm failing to set it up properly to fit all my requirements.
> I'm using Deciding Scope and deciderules.NotOnDomainsDecideRule is
> behaving really strange to me. When I have one seed in form
> http://www.abc.com/something/ and there are links in form
> http://www.abc.com/something_else/ their are rejected by this
> NotOnDomainsDecideRule rule. I was debbuging it a little and it makes
> surt prefix from both URLs and check whether the referenced link SURT
> starts with the whole SURT of the link of the seed which obviously
> fails but I thing it shouldn't because they have a same domain. Can
> somebody explain it to me?

Aha... the NotOnDomainsDecideRule and NotOnHostsDecideRule) are 
buggy. They derive from the wrong superclass. I thought this was 
fixed pre-1.8, but it wasn't. A fix will be in CVS HEAD soon.

- Gordon @ IA
